tool_description: BestWeather API provides high-performance, low-cost access to global historical weather records and weather forecasts. Available weather metrics include temperature, rainfall, wind speed (including gusts), snow, perceived temperature , humidity, and pressure.
name: BestWeather
title: BestWeather

api_list.name: Last 24 hours weather
api_list.description: The 24 hour period ending at the current time (rounded to the currenthour).

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location is the address, partial address or latitude,longitude location for which to retrieve weather data. You can also use US ZIP Codes.

optional_parameters.name: unitGroup
optional_parameters.description:
The system of units used for the output data. Supported values are us,uk,metric.
Defaults to US system of units.

api_list.name: Today Weather
api_list.description: From midnight to the current time at the requested location.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location is the address, partial address or latitude,longitude location for which to retrieve weather data. You can also use US ZIP Codes.

optional_parameters.name: unitGroup
optional_parameters.description:
The system of units used for the output data. Supported values are us,uk,metric.
Defaults to US system of units.

api_list.name: Yesterday Weather
api_list.description: From midnight to midnight on yesterday’s date.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location is the address, partial address or latitude,longitude location for which to retrieve weather data. You can also use US ZIP Codes.

optional_parameters.name: unitGroup
optional_parameters.description:
The system of units used for the output data. Supported values are us,uk,metric.
Defaults to US system of units.

api_list.name: 15-Day Forecast
api_list.description: The forecast at the requested location for the next 15 days.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location is the address, partial address or latitude,longitude location for which to retrieve weather data. You can also use US ZIP Codes.

optional_parameters.name: unitGroup
optional_parameters.description:
The system of units used for the output data. Supported values are us,uk,metric.
Defaults to US system of units.
